question:
You have a complaint about the hotel you stayed at while attending a meeting that was booked by the organiser of a company meeting. Write a letter to the organiser of the meeting and include
Details about the meeting
The problem you face
What should be done
text: I am one of your participants who joined your last meeting which has taken place in Toronto last weekend as a senior manager in order to negotiate the multinational contract's circumferences  that will accommodate in Toronto  along with the evening meal.

I am writing this letter in order to draw your kind notice for arranging the event in a five-star multi-luxurious hotel but the arrangements and dishes had some problems that I want to mention them. also, I have some recommendations that may be efficient.

Initially,If I want to describe more about some difficulties that happened during the session,I should say the plates of seafood  served there were not fresh adequately moreover, the conference hall's air conditioner didn't work appropriately . Therefore,these may seem like some trivial disorders but  controversially could completely impact our next session's foreign guest's respect for the commitment.
For the last thing,I am going to give some piece of advice to change the place for the latter sit in order to prevent these kinds of scandals in  such an important colloquium.
I would kindly appreciate it if you incorporate the aforementioned issues.
